query: ALTER TABLE scheduled_reports MODIFY COLUMN report_type ENUM('spc_summary', 'cpk_analysis', 'violation_report', 'production_line_status', 'ai_vision_dashboard', 'radar_chart_comparison', 'oee', 'cpk', 'oee_cpk_combined', 'production_summary') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'spc_summary';
